title: Please give me your thoughts on this.
body:
_Okay okay. Before I start this, I just wanna say that this is **my first time doing this**, also I would like to add that it is understandable if you don't believe me, as there are two sides to the story and **I'm only giving my side**. As of this post, I am currently on a losing streak, so if you see my match history it isnt looking so good._

Anyway so it starts in champion select, I am duo with my friend who is P3 while I'm on P5. My friend is first pick and I am last, thinking I am probably going support I write "anything but jg", because jg is my weakest role but I dont mind playing anything else. Mind you, I dont see myself as a bad player, nor do I see myself as a good one, I play fairly average if I do say so myself. Since we're on redside I am actually the final pick, and to my surprise I am given the role of jg, so I pick one of my safe junglers maokai.

Blue Team (pick order) - Kalista, ali, rengar, syndra, wukong
Red team (pick order) - Corki(my mate), gangplank, kennen, malz and maokai(me) 

Fast forward to in game, we get first blood and I go to gank mid lane but gp dies to the syndra and I barely make it out alive, he says "dont come mid lane.. just let me play the game how I want to", being respectful of my teammates during laning phase I dont go mid. We then start falling behind because of their superb jungler rengar who is everywhere and is ganking non stop (ofc he can't gank non stop, exaggeration, but never the less was producing a large amount of ganks). I am starting to get blamed by the gp and malz, who to my knowledge was not duo queue, I explain that I said prior to the game during champion select that I said "anything but jg", gp mostly argues and states that i did not say anything backed up by malz, doubting myself I ask my duo partner who I was in a skype call with, he tells me I did and backs me up in chat, where gp states that I did infact state that but I didnt specifically state I don't/can't jg, the argument ends there.

Fast forward into the game I buy a sightstone because the malz did not, and then we start coming back a little but we ended up consecutively losing fights and then they end. However, before they ended, gp said in all chat to report me for 'trolling' and here is what he said during end game lobby..

http://puu.sh/kZlyx/8d885e633d.jpg
http://puu.sh/kZlCV/5b835c2537.jpg
http://puu.sh/kZlDA/8abe8a080f.jpg


_TL;DR_ : I got blamed/flamed for picking a role I said I didn't/couldn't want to play.


But in his defense, I think I should've explicitly stated I can't jg, but never the less he shouldn't have did what he did.

**What are your thoughts?**

EDIT: I take the game and esp ranked seriously, I myself am a competitive bloke so you'll never see me surrendering at 20 unless it's 110% unwinnable. 

EDIT 2: Blurred out the names of the people apart from my mates and mine.

replies.body: Edited out the name and shame (reporting other players).
Just did it, sorry about that

There's a lot of points to consider here.

- Flaming
Excessive swearing and abuse is never acceptable, so they're an ass for doing that.

- Competitive
This was a ranked game, which most people take seriously. Furthermore, you're in Platinum, relatively high up in ranked. If you can't be at least competent in every role, you probably shouldn't be so ready to play ranked.

- Learning
The best way to learn is by playing, so you would invertently get better by playing a role you're weak at, but there is a non competitive environment where you should learn the fundamentals first.

you were kind of in the wrong for bringing unbalance to their competitive game, but at the same time, he was an ass. Report, and git gud

Just going to come at this from the other angle here because in my personal opinion OP isn't in the wrong regardless of rank.

First off, everyone in league has roles they are bad at, and roles they are good at, if this has been stated in champion select and you still get the role, you have done your job in informing your allies what they are doing in that they are putting someone uncomfortable with jungle into the jungle position.

To double onto this fact, how is the OP in the wrong simply for the fact that the Enemy jungler carried?

Sure maybe if he was more skilled he could have stopped it, but it's possible that the Rengar just deserves to climb and this is just a showing of it.

As a note, no one should ever state that they "Can't" play a role, because this is utter bullshit, everyone can play every role, it's just a question as to what skill level they carry with it.

If anything OP being in jungle as someone who openly said he isn't extremely skilled in jungle is just as much his teams fault more then a personal fault

Thanks for your input, jungle has always been my weakest role so I usually turn away from it, never playing it because I was just weak in it.

You're right though, I should go grind some normal games as a jg. Thanks for your input bud! :)

Oh he's the type of person who does shit and than loves and tries to blame it on someone else. I hate people who are like this. They only do it to make themselves feel better. Posting this isn't gonna help idk if it'll make you feel better but hey it's OCE. OCE is filled with scrubs like him.

You're probably the type of person that never wards and blames your jungler when you get ganked - the way I read the original post is that an entire team got ruined by a well played rengar, and thus they blamed maokai. I mean, it's easier to blame maokai than to admit rengar was better than them

Yeah the other team played very well, and we did our best. **I don't blame him for doing bad mechanically in game**, he did good in zoning and what not, he didn't even want to surrender early, we only had the vote to surrender once and it was a 1 yes and 4 no vote. 

It was just the attitude he portrayed in this game.
and scrubs like you. srs

Um I was on a roll with him at one point but the thing is he doesn't seem good in the jg anymore. If you see most junglers they're like damage overall with very little items to keep them healthy. Maokai just seems to be a bit to slow. He's now and better played Top lane. Sorry.
He's a fine jungler for someone who doesn't play jungle, Jungle Maokai carries by proxy through utility (ult) and half decent ganks (CC on every ability)
I hadn't thought of maokai! I'm still messing around trying to find a go to jungler myself. May give him a go
He's a pretty standard jg, not a carry one though. If you want to carry I'd give Vi ago, my D4 mate plays him a lot and he says she's great at carrying.

I'd definitely recommend Maokai jungle for anyone who doesn't jungle often. My second is jng but, I don't know the mechanics/counterpicks well enough, or have a large enough champion pool in jng so if I'm unsure I usually safe pick Maokai (or if they're AD heavy, Rammus). Slow he may be, and he won't necessarily carry, but he can be quite strong and he's a real safe pick to have because you're guaranteed good cc and some soak.

tl;dr I like Maokai and agree with your choice to play him

The GP is one of those players who's gonna trash talk you whatever you do/say, he's the kind that waits and watches for the slightest thing to go wrong and fins someone to blame for it (if he was adc I can almost guarantee he'd be abusing his support) so your best option is to not respond (even if you don't mute them) and hope they get bored. Ofc it doesn't help you here, and it's a frustrating solution but...other than reporting them, it's all you can really do.
I definitely got a very negative vibe from him during the game, it's really funny how these people try to spread lies to get others on their side.

I had the choice of Vi or Mao and chose Mao because of the fact my team didn't have a tank. Personally I think he's an alright jungle, but yes I do get your point of how he isn't as good in the jg right now.

i am astounded. someone in plat that didn't play particularly well and people are finding ways to blame his teammates, YET when someone in lower elo plays decently and has afk/troll team mates is told they are shit and that it's always their fault  BY SOME OF THE VERY SAME PEOPLE in this thread.

Because these are 2 different things.

This is a player who is playing in plat level games who isn't good on one role.

Most of the threads your talking about are bronze level players who still play like bronzies on most roles, if not all of them.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVUAdFmI,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-10-26T12:32:05.984+0000)
>
> Because these are 2 different things.
> 
> This is a player who is playing in plat level games who isn't good on one role.
> 
> Most of the threads your talking about are bronze level players who still play like bronzies on most roles, if not all of them.

no it's exactly the same thing.

your logic right now is:
if you lose a game in bronze = you're shit no matter what

if plat, but play at bronze level on a role and lose = dw it's not just your fault.

If you can't carry out of bronze, you deserve to be in bronze, this guy isn't good on one role which he can avoid in basically 95% of all games.

They are 2 different things.

Especially considering this guy still did fine on jungle.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVUAdFmI,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-26T12:42:16.447+0000)
>
> If you can't carry out of bronze, you deserve to be in bronze, this guy isn't good on one role which he can avoid in basically 95% of all games.
> 
> They are 2 different things.
> 
> Especially considering this guy still did fine on jungle.

it doesn't matter what elo you're in, it is incredibly hard to carry a game to victory if you're teammates are not present and/or are intentionally trying to lose a game. i don't know why you keep ignoring this and keep saying "if you lost a game in bronze, it's because you're shit and deserve to be there", yet seem to acknowledge that this guy didn't have the best teammates which contributed to the loss and are giving him a pass for not being terribly good at a role.

And here your trying to tell me that everyone that is in bronze is in there because of trolls and afk's.

Which begs the question, how did anyone ever get out of bronze?

Your still trying to compare 2 massively different scenarios.

Fact is a lot of the bronzies that complain about afk's refuse to acknowledge the fact that in the majority of their games, they are actually a decent reason as to why they are losing.

This guy understands that his play wasn't the best, and isn't bringing ego into this, bronzies do.

Simple difference.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVUAdFmI,comment-id=000400000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-26T12:52:18.158+0000)
>
> And here your trying to tell me that everyone that is in bronze is in there because of trolls and afk's.
> 
> Which begs the question, how did anyone ever get out of bronze?
> 
> Your still trying to compare 2 massively different scenarios.
> 
> Fact is a lot of the bronzies that complain about afk's refuse to acknowledge the fact that in the majority of their games, they are actually a decent reason as to why they are losing.
> 
> This guy understands that his play wasn't the best, and isn't bringing ego into this, bronzies do.
> 
> Simple difference.

You're putting words in my mouth now. I never stated that people don't deserve to be in bronze. I have never stated that i don't acknowledge faults of my own. I have never even talked about games other than those that you have a serious disadvantage in because of afk/feeders and what riot can do to fix these things.  The point was that you KEEP saying that NO MATTER WHAT if you lose a game it is YOUR fault. Even when there's a heap of evidence that it was mostly OTHER people's fault in a particular game. But not only do you put the blame, you get abusive and say 'you're shit".

Yet magically if it's someone in plat this doesn't apply to them, even when they actually didn't do particularity well.

Proof that you're someone that just like to bash people of lower elo, because it makes you feel more comfortable in gold 5.

http://cdn.meme.am/instances2/500x/2614442.jpg

Fact is if someone has climbed to Plat

And here's something shocking

THEY ARE GOOD AT THIS GAME.

Fact is if someone is stuck in bronze

They are bad at this game.

It's really rather simple, fact is a lot of bronzies come on here and blame the 10% of games where there are afk's when they have 90% of games where there isn't, and still fail to actually climb out.

They come onto these boards with the only intent on blaming everyone but their own gameplay.

Fact is they need to learn to not have an Ego, then they can actually learn how to get good and how to climb.

> [{quoted}](name=JasonWazza,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVUAdFmI,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-26T13:06:58.585+0000)
>
> http://cdn.meme.am/instances2/500x/2614442.jpg
> 
> Fact is if someone has climbed to Plat
> 
> And here's something shocking
> 
> THEY ARE GOOD AT THIS GAME.
> 
> Fact is if someone is stuck in bronze
> 
> They are bad at this game.
> 
> It's really rather simple, fact is a lot of bronzies come on here and blame the 10% of games where there are afk's when they have 90% of games where there isn't, and still fail to actually climb out.
> 
> They come onto these boards with the only intent on blaming everyone but their own gameplay.
> 
> Fact is they need to learn to not have an Ego, then they can actually learn how to get good and how to climb.

Where exactly do you get your number's from? I can assure you this happens a lot more than 10% of the time, especially in the short term.  I'm not just referring to when it's on my team. Other night i played 2 games. Total of 3 afk/dc and 1 intent feeder. 3/4 of them on my team. Won the first game as it was a 4v4. 2nd game was impossible to win because 1 teammate was not present the entire game and 1 person started to intentionally feed because another teammate abused him after 1 unsuccessful gank. If you were to check my personal stats you would see i did fine, if not quite well. But again you're just twisting things around. All I've ever said is that riot can fix these things because why should people have to constantly deal with d/c etc in their games just because they're bronze or silver? Then you always pipe in and start saying that i have some ego and the real reason I lose is because I'm really shit and deserve it. Somehow it's not possible that i lose some games because of this crap that is much more common than you realise. yet in a different elo you acknowledge things. it actually has absolutely nothing to do with climbing or how good or not i (or others) are.

Mate, chill out. Yes - you will ALWAYS lose some games because of trolls. Ok the other hand, you will ALWAYS win some games because of trolls. The problem with most people in bronze is they CREATE trolls ('omg the enemy rengar jungler carried so hard! Our maokai is so sht it's all his fault the feeder') without recognising when they've simply been outplayed. Yes im bronze btw, and deserve it

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVUAdFmI,comment-id=0004000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-10-26T20:44:48.684+0000)
>
> Mate, chill out. Yes - you will ALWAYS lose some games because of trolls. Ok the other hand, you will ALWAYS win some games because of trolls. The problem with most people in bronze is they CREATE trolls ('omg the enemy rengar jungler carried so hard! Our maokai is so sht it's all his fault the feeder') without recognising when they've simply been outplayed. Yes im bronze btw, and deserve it

the fact that it "ALWAYS" happens either way is exactly why riot needs to fix it. there's plenty of way they can, but they don't as quoted by one of their staff as not being currently a priority. do you people even fucking read what i say? you read 1 line and just assume im saying "omg i lose all my games coz of trolls thats why im not diamond". also, if u actually fucking read i talk the most about people NOT PRESENT in the game at all. ie someone who disconnected from the start or for most of the game but of course in low elo it doesn't take much for someone to rage leave mid-game or start trolling so that's an issue too. its about actually making the game better for everyone. you know, fixing toxic things. nothing to do with thinking i'm supposed to be in challenger or something. got no fucking idea why you keep bringing up whether people are bad and why they may or may not lose legitimate games. it has absolutely nothing to do with the issue.

The point that I'm trying to get through your head is that those in bronze belong in bronze.

"it "ALWAYS" happens either way"
 - This holds ZERO weight in the reason why you and I are in bronze.

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVUAdFmI,comment-id=000400000000000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2015-10-31T08:54:44.926+0000)
>
> The point that I'm trying to get through your head is that those in bronze belong in bronze.
> 
> "it "ALWAYS" happens either way"
>  - This holds ZERO weight in the reason why you and I are in bronze.

what does any of that have to do with what i said? i don't know why you think improving things so people stop losing/winning games simply because of how many d/cs there are  is going to somehow make someone who truly is bronze not stay in bronze? i keep stressing that it has absolutely nothing to do with how good someone is or isn't and has nothing to do with climbing, yet you keep retorting with something like that. It's about improving the quality of games. Just because someone is bronze or silver doesn't mean that they don't lose or win certain games because of other factors out of their control. And just because someone may be bronze or silver, it doesn't mean that they deserve this experience in a decent percentage of their games. Whether or not they would be capable of winning had those games been legitimate is irrelevant.

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EVUAdFmI,comment-id=00040000000000000000000000000000000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-02T20:32:41.554+0000)
>
> Lol now you're over exaggerating the amount of undeserved wins or losses in games. Don't forget bro, I'm in bronze. I know exactly what goes on. And you know what? 9/10 games that I lose, our team deserves to lose! And likewise

its not just losing. how often when you win did the enemy team have a disadvantage? also people do still end up winning games with the disadvantages i have mentioned. also sometimes both teams have it so its ''even". i think you're just misinterpreting how often I'm saying it happens. seems like you think i'm saying it's every game. but it definitely happens enough to be detrimental to the experience of the game.  almost every time i play, as in a session, there are some games like this. that is enough to require fixing. note: there is an obvious difference in how often and how easily it happens from when i was in silver1/gold5 to now in low bronze.

Lol now you're over exaggerating the amount of undeserved wins or losses in games. Don't forget bro, I'm in bronze. I know exactly what goes on. And you know what? 9/10 games that I lose, our team deserves to lose! And likewise

I agree totally, one of my friends hit gold 5 and started thinking that everyone below him were shit. Eventually I was able to convince him that because of people in higher elo keep saying that if you lose in bronze in my case, that you deserve to be there. that those people will actually starting believing they belong to be there so they stop caring and start ruining the game for the other 4 people on their team
Realize that season end is coming, and everyone in gold will have to earn their place.
MMR is kept.
That may be accurate but recall last seasons reset, MMR was kept but some people fell multiple tiers (High Plat down to low silver) so again, it will have to be earned.
OP should be banned for playing Maokai and going negative with that broken cancer champion.
Don't know if srs or...
wait that malz was support? smh....

It wasn't his first time might've been good in another comp, but it was pretty selfish for him because we lacked a tank.

He did good damage wise though, just could've been better in a different comp.

It is really unbelievable for people in plat to actually play Malzahar support and then not buy a sightstone ..... Anyway it is not you to blame for losing this game. Other than that the enemy team comp looks really scary as well with multiple aoe cc from Kalista, Alistar, Wukong and Syndra so the chances of you winning teamfights is extremely low if the enemies are grouped up and that wukong get a good initiation on your team. You obviously did your best by doing what you think your team needs. For example the sightstone and also playing Maokai because your team clearly lacks a tank. Other than that you might want to censor the names of the teammates in the picture because i believe this is a form of name and shame. You did what you could and your Maokai pick in my opinion is a pretty good choice into a kalista and Syndra because kalista mobility is denied by Maokai's twisted advance and Syndra is really easy to gank because she lacks mobility. I am not a jungle main and don't really know much about jungling but a tip from me is to always look at the minimap and take a look at where rengar/enemy jungler apperead and invade the enemy jungle when they are spotted and ward their jungle. I believe warding the rengar's jungle will help a lot because it will significantly reduce the effectiveness of a rengar stealth gank. Other that that im pretty sure that rengar is terrible at farming the jungle and have pretty bad early clears and takes a lot of damage from the jungle so maybe play an early game jungler to shut him down.   Its seriously not your fault so don't feel down and move on. You get bad teammates and that is all to it.

I'll get to bluring out the names, but yeah thanks for the advice bro I don't usually get riled up about these things, it's just this one game. Totally forgort about the game until I logged in again ahaha.
